entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ECDsa private key PKCS binary doesn't match the same key after X509Certificate2.CopyWithPrivateKey() (Windows) #97932
    Future
  • .NET 9 Host Improvements #97931
    9.0.0
  • Unable to configure host environment from a JSON settings file when using Host.CreateApplicationBuilder #97930
  • System.Collections.Generic.ValueListBuilder<T> does not implement Insert method correctly #97928
  • [API Proposal]: A way to change volume of a played sound with `SoundPlayer` #97926
  • [browser][mt] Jiterp Failed to patch opcode #97925
    9.0.0
  • Vector512.Create doesn't work as expected #97924
  • [NativeAOT] Rounding helpers use wrong rounding algorithm #97922
  • Question on string.Split inconsistency between `count = 1` and `count > 1` #97920
  • [browser][MT] WebWorkerTest.WaitAssertsOnJSInteropThreads #97914
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Depleted pthreadPoolSize #97913
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 WebAssembly AOT not generating trampoline functions #97906

Closed

  • Vectorize several TensorPrimitive operations for double #96452
    9.0.0
  • Illegal instruction on ARM64 Linux #90942
    Future
  • Re-evaluate if we need `RefTypeKill` Refpositions #87294
    Future
  • PGO causes regression on stateless struct instance method call inlining #97915
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] NativePrimitiveDecoder generates unaligned accesses with VLDR instruction #97912
  • Setting\getting a function pointer field with reflection not supported #97833
  • [browser] System.Text.Json.Serialization - OutOfMemoryException #97500
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix building on ARMhf userland on top of AARCH64 kernel #97929
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97927
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Support more scaled addressing modes on arm64 #97921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Save R9 (REG_SAVED_LOCALLOC_SP) in PInvoke frames #97919
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] SIMD cleanups #97918
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fix possible runaway mutex in ManagedWebSocket.ReceiveAsyncPrivate() #97911
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][reflection] get/set function pointer fields #97909
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Assertprop improvements #97908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Remove more llvm restrictions. #97907
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Merged

  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_EG_3A, IF_SVE_EY_3A, IF_SVE_EZ_3A #97900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Cosh/Sinh/Tanh for double #97874
    area-System.Numerics
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97890
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Mark unaligned reads in NativeFormatReader as unaligned for the JIT #97917
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CV_3A and IF_SVE_CV_3B #97886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix reflection-getting function pointer fields #97854
    area-System.Reflection
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Initialize R12 pointer from context in StackFrameIterator #97903
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move `DevirtualizationManager` to `NodeFactory` #97855
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Try to fold basic arithmetic operations as part of import #97901
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Avoid allocating HashSet in Distinct() for some counts #97845
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IF_4A` to `SVE_JK_4B` #97739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add ARM64 encoding for group IF_SVE_CK_2A #97887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add encoding for ARM64 IF_SVE_CJ_2A instruction group #97885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][ws] fix ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedInflightConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException #97868
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Standardize on using code location for interior asm code references #97853
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for Vector<T>.Indices and Vector.CreateSequence #97880
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • IL test entry points should be in types so test discovery can occur. #97904
    test-bug, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • Fast field access #97784
    area-System.Reflection
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Update TensorPrimitives to vectorize for size(T) is 1 or 2 #97835
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove synchronization from Http2Connection.ExtendWindow #97878
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Alternative fix for ARM64 signed small type cmpxchg without LSE #97902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Stop trying to format HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT property with locale settings #97891
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 8.0.x
